extendedInfo.description: If you are David Guetta's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check David Guetta's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all David Guetta's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of David Guetta's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Just a Little More Love- Guetta Blaster- Pop Life- One Love- Nothing but the Beat-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Always- Atomic Food- Baby When The Light- Bullshit & Party- Can't U Feel The Change- Choose- Crank It Up- Delirious- Distortion- Do Something Love- Every Chance We Get We Run- Every Time We Touch- Get Up- Gettin' Over- Give Me Something- Higher- How Soon Is Now- I Can Only Imagine- I Gotta Feeling (FMIF Remix Edit)- I Just Wanna Fuck- I Wanna Go Crazy- If We Ever- I'm A Machine- In Love With Myself- In My Head- It's The Way You Love Me- Joan Of Arc- Just A Little More Love- Just One Last Time- Last Train- Like A Machine- Little Bad Girl- Louder Than Words- Love Don't Let Me Go- Love Is Gone- Love Is Gone (Fred Rister & Joachim Garraud Radio Edit Remix)- Memories- Missing You- Money- Never Take Away My Freedom- Night Of Your Life- Nothing Really Matters- On The Dancefloor- One Love- People Come, People Go- Play Hard- Raise Your Hands- Repeat- Sexy 17- Sexy Bitch- Sexy Chick- She Wolf (Falling To Pieces)- Sound Of Letting Go- Stay- Stay With Me- Surrender- Sweat- The World Is Mine- This Is Not A Love Song- Time- Titanium- Titanium (Spanish Version)- Tomorrow Can Wait- Toyfriend- Turn Me On- Used To Be The One- When Love Takes Over- Where Them Girls At- Who's That Chick?- Winner Of The Game- Without You- You- You Are The Music- You're Not Alone
